message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to do?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $130?
I appreciate the compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
I understand you're getting close to your bottom line, Bob. I'm willing to give a bit more. How about we meet at $125?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $118. That's as low as I'm willing to go.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. How about we meet at $122?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. I can do $119, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. How about we meet at $121?
